mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ((SELECT po.out_id, po.out_name, po.out_type, po.oper_id, po.oper_time, po.desc, po.out_type_billno, po.out_isdel, pd.batch_no, pd.amount, pd.out_date, pd.unit FROM product_material_out po INNER JOIN product_material_out_detail pd ON(po.out_id=pd.out_id) WHERE po.out_type_billno=#{out_type_billno} ) AS a )

SELECT out_type, CASE out_type WHEN 9001 THEN '采购退货' WHEN 9002 THEN '销售出库' WHEN 9003 THEN '研发领用' END AS out_type_str, name_ch, name_en, cas, sku, r_purchase_id, amount, unit, stock_status, stock_status_name, staff_name, staff_id, staff_name_return, staff_id_return, purchase_id, purchase_time, return_time, supplier_id, supplier_name FROM (SELECT 9001 AS out_type, k2.name_ch, k2.name_en, k2.cas, k2.sku, t1.r_purchase_id, k1.amount, k1.unit, t1.stock_status, t6.dict_name AS stock_status_name, t4.staff_name AS staff_name, t4.staff_id, t3.staff_name AS staff_name_return, t3.staff_id AS staff_id_return, t2.purchase_id, t2.purchase_time, t1.return_time, t5.cs_sup_id AS supplier_id, t5.NAME AS supplier_name FROM material_purchase_return t1 LEFT JOIN material_purchase t2 ON (t1.purchase_id = t2.purchase_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t3 ON (t1.staff_id = t3.staff_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t4 ON (t2.staff_id = t4.staff_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info t5 ON (t2.supplier_id = t5.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict t6 ON (t1.stock_status = t6.dict_id) LEFT JOIN material_purchase_return_detail k1 ON k1.r_purchase_id = t1.r_purchase_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k2 ON k2.product_id = k1.product_id WHERE t1.return_isdel = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 9003 AS out_type, k3.name_ch, k3.name_en, k3.cas, k3.sku, tt1.use_id, tt1.use_amount, tt1.use_unit, tt1.status, tt3.dict_name, '', 0, tt2.staff_name, tt2.staff_id, tt1.use_id, '', tt1.use_time, '', '' FROM product_use tt1 LEFT JOIN staff_info tt2 ON (tt2.staff_id = tt1.use_staff) LEFT JOIN pss_dict tt3 ON (tt1.status = tt3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN product_material_info k3 ON k3.product_id = tt1.product_id WHERE tt1.use_is_del = 0 AND tt1.status NOT IN(11002,11003,11004,5001,5002,5003) UNION ALL SELECT 9002 AS out_type, k6.name_ch, k6.name_en, k6.cas, k6.sku, p1.sale_id, k5.amount, k5.unit, p1.`status`, p3.dict_name, '', 0, p2.staff_name, p2.staff_id, p1.sale_id, '', p1.sale_time, p4.supplier_id, p4.`name` AS supplier_name FROM product_sale p1 LEFT JOIN staff_info p2 ON (p2.staff_id = p1.staff_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict p3 ON (p1.`status` = p3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info p4 ON (p1.customer_id = p4.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN product_sale_detail k5 ON k5.sale_id = p1.sale_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k6 ON k6.product_id = k5.product_id WHERE p1.sale_isdel = 0) t1 WHERE t1.r_purchase_id != 0 AND t1.stock_status!=8001 ORDER BY t1.return_time DESC
LIMIT 3

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT 9001 AS out_type, k2.cas, k2.sku, t1.r_purchase_id, t2.purchase_name, t1.stock_status, t6.dict_name AS stock_status_name, t4.staff_name AS staff_name, t4.staff_id, t3.staff_name AS staff_name_return, t3.staff_id AS staff_id_return, t2.purchase_id, t2.purchase_time, t1.return_time, t5.cs_sup_id AS supplier_id, t5.NAME AS supplier_name FROM material_purchase_return t1 LEFT JOIN material_purchase t2 ON (t1.purchase_id = t2.purchase_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t3 ON (t1.staff_id = t3.staff_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t4 ON (t2.staff_id = t4.staff_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info t5 ON (t2.supplier_id = t5.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict t6 ON (t1.stock_status = t6.dict_id) LEFT JOIN material_purchase_return_detail k1 ON k1.r_purchase_id=t1.r_purchase_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k2 ON k2.product_id=k1.product_id WHERE t1.return_isdel = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 9003 AS out_type, k3.cas, k3.sku, tt1.use_id, tt1.use_name, tt1.status, tt3.dict_name, '', 0, tt2.staff_name, tt2.staff_id, tt1.use_id, '', tt1.use_time, '', '' FROM product_use tt1 LEFT JOIN staff_info tt2 ON (tt2.staff_id = tt1.use_staff) LEFT JOIN pss_dict tt3 ON (tt1.status = tt3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN product_material_info k3 ON k3.product_id=tt1.product_id WHERE tt1.use_is_del = 0 AND tt1.status NOT IN(11002,11003,11004,5001,5002,5003) UNION ALL SELECT 9002 AS out_type, k6.cas, k6.sku, p1.sale_id, p1.sale_name, p1.`status`, p3.dict_name, '', 0, p2.staff_name, p2.staff_id, p1.sale_id, '', p1.sale_time, p4.supplier_id, p4.`name` AS supplier_name FROM product_sale p1 LEFT JOIN staff_info p2 ON (p2.staff_id = p1.staff_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict p3 ON (p1.`status` = p3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info p4 ON (p1.customer_id = p4.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN product_sale_detail k5 ON k5.sale_id=p1.sale_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k6 ON k6.product_id=k5.product_id WHERE p1.sale_isdel = 0) t1 WHERE t1.r_purchase_id != 0 AND t1.stock_status!=8001

SELECT out_type, CASE out_type WHEN 9001 THEN '采购退货' WHEN 9002 THEN '销售出库' WHEN 9003 THEN '研发领用' END AS out_type_str, name_ch, name_en, cas, sku, r_purchase_id, amount, unit, stock_status, stock_status_name, staff_name, staff_id, staff_name_return, staff_id_return, purchase_id, purchase_time, return_time, supplier_id, supplier_name FROM (SELECT 9001 AS out_type, k2.name_ch, k2.name_en, k2.cas, k2.sku, t1.r_purchase_id, k1.amount, k1.unit, t1.stock_status, t6.dict_name AS stock_status_name, t4.staff_name AS staff_name, t4.staff_id, t3.staff_name AS staff_name_return, t3.staff_id AS staff_id_return, t2.purchase_id, t2.purchase_time, t1.return_time, t5.cs_sup_id AS supplier_id, t5.NAME AS supplier_name FROM material_purchase_return t1 LEFT JOIN material_purchase t2 ON (t1.purchase_id = t2.purchase_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t3 ON (t1.staff_id = t3.staff_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t4 ON (t2.staff_id = t4.staff_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info t5 ON (t2.supplier_id = t5.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict t6 ON (t1.stock_status = t6.dict_id) LEFT JOIN material_purchase_return_detail k1 ON k1.r_purchase_id = t1.r_purchase_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k2 ON k2.product_id = k1.product_id WHERE t1.return_isdel = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 9003 AS out_type, k3.name_ch, k3.name_en, k3.cas, k3.sku, tt1.use_id, tt1.use_amount, tt1.use_unit, tt1.status, tt3.dict_name, '', 0, tt2.staff_name, tt2.staff_id, tt1.use_id, '', tt1.use_time, '', '' FROM product_use tt1 LEFT JOIN staff_info tt2 ON (tt2.staff_id = tt1.use_staff) LEFT JOIN pss_dict tt3 ON (tt1.status = tt3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN product_material_info k3 ON k3.product_id = tt1.product_id WHERE tt1.use_is_del = 0 AND tt1.status NOT IN(11002,11003,11004,5001,5002,5003) UNION ALL SELECT 9002 AS out_type, k6.name_ch, k6.name_en, k6.cas, k6.sku, p1.sale_id, k5.amount, k5.unit, p1.`status`, p3.dict_name, '', 0, p2.staff_name, p2.staff_id, p1.sale_id, '', p1.sale_time, p4.supplier_id, p4.`name` AS supplier_name FROM product_sale p1 LEFT JOIN staff_info p2 ON (p2.staff_id = p1.staff_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict p3 ON (p1.`status` = p3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info p4 ON (p1.customer_id = p4.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN product_sale_detail k5 ON k5.sale_id = p1.sale_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k6 ON k6.product_id = k5.product_id WHERE p1.sale_isdel = 0) t1 WHERE t1.r_purchase_id != 0 AND t1.stock_status=8001 ORDER BY t1.return_time DESC
LIMIT 3

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT 9001 AS out_type, k2.cas, k2.sku, t1.r_purchase_id, t2.purchase_name, t1.stock_status, t6.dict_name AS stock_status_name, t4.staff_name AS staff_name, t4.staff_id, t3.staff_name AS staff_name_return, t3.staff_id AS staff_id_return, t2.purchase_id, t2.purchase_time, t1.return_time, t5.cs_sup_id AS supplier_id, t5.NAME AS supplier_name FROM material_purchase_return t1 LEFT JOIN material_purchase t2 ON (t1.purchase_id = t2.purchase_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t3 ON (t1.staff_id = t3.staff_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info t4 ON (t2.staff_id = t4.staff_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info t5 ON (t2.supplier_id = t5.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict t6 ON (t1.stock_status = t6.dict_id) LEFT JOIN material_purchase_return_detail k1 ON k1.r_purchase_id=t1.r_purchase_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k2 ON k2.product_id=k1.product_id WHERE t1.return_isdel = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 9003 AS out_type, k3.cas, k3.sku, tt1.use_id, tt1.use_name, tt1.status, tt3.dict_name, '', 0, tt2.staff_name, tt2.staff_id, tt1.use_id, '', tt1.use_time, '', '' FROM product_use tt1 LEFT JOIN staff_info tt2 ON (tt2.staff_id = tt1.use_staff) LEFT JOIN pss_dict tt3 ON (tt1.status = tt3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN product_material_info k3 ON k3.product_id=tt1.product_id WHERE tt1.use_is_del = 0 AND tt1.status NOT IN(11002,11003,11004,5001,5002,5003) UNION ALL SELECT 9002 AS out_type, k6.cas, k6.sku, p1.sale_id, p1.sale_name, p1.`status`, p3.dict_name, '', 0, p2.staff_name, p2.staff_id, p1.sale_id, '', p1.sale_time, p4.supplier_id, p4.`name` AS supplier_name FROM product_sale p1 LEFT JOIN staff_info p2 ON (p2.staff_id = p1.staff_id) LEFT JOIN pss_dict p3 ON (p1.`status` = p3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN cus_supplier_info p4 ON (p1.customer_id = p4.cs_sup_id) LEFT JOIN product_sale_detail k5 ON k5.sale_id=p1.sale_id LEFT JOIN product_material_info k6 ON k6.product_id=k5.product_id WHERE p1.sale_isdel = 0) t1 WHERE t1.r_purchase_id != 0 AND t1.stock_status=8001

SELECT t1.purchase_d_id, t1.product_id, t4.amount AS amount_used, t4.enter_d_ids, t4.batch_no, t4.space_id, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(d.space_name, '-') FROM dict_warehouse_space d WHERE FIND_IN_SET( d.space_id, query_parent_warehouse (t4.space_id) ) ) AS space_name, RO.amount AS out_amount, RO.out_type_d_billno, RO.out_desc, RD.r_purchase_d_id, RD.stock_status, CASE RD.stock_status WHEN 8001 THEN '已出库' WHEN 8002 THEN '未出库' WHEN 8003 THEN '部分出库' END AS stock_status_name, t1.unit, t1.purity, t2.name_ch AS product_name, t2.name_en, t2.product_type, t3.dict_name AS product_type_name FROM material_purchase_detail t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.enter_type_billno, d.amount, d.product_id, s.space_id, s.space_name, d.enter_d_id AS enter_d_ids, d.batch_no FROM product_material_enter e LEFT JOIN product_material_enter_detail d ON (e.enter_id = d.enter_id) LEFT JOIN dict_warehouse_space s ON (d.space_id = s.space_id) ) t4 ON ( t1.purchase_id = t4.enter_type_billno AND t1.product_id = t4.product_id ) LEFT JOIN product_material_info t2 ON ( t1.product_id = t2.product_id ) LEFT JOIN pss_dict t3 ON (t2.product_type = t3.dict_id) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT D1.R_PURCHASE_D_ID, D1.batch_no, D1.amount, R1.R_PURCHASE_ID, R1.purchase_id, D1.product_id, D1.reason, D1.stock_status FROM material_purchase_return R1 LEFT JOIN material_purchase_return_detail D1 ON ( R1.R_PURCHASE_ID = D1.R_PURCHASE_ID ) ) RD ON (t4.batch_no = RD.batch_no) LEFT JOIN product_material_out_detail RO ON (t4.enter_d_ids = RO.enter_d_id) WHERE t1.purchase_detail_isdel = 0 AND t4.batch_no IS NOT NULL AND RD.purchase_id IS NOT NULL AND t1.purchase_id = #{purchase_id} ORDER BY t1.purchase_d_id DESC

CALL PRO_OUT_INVENTORY_SUBMIT( #{POUT_PURCHASE_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_PRODUCT_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_OUT_TYPE_BILLNO, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_BATCH_NO , mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{POUT_UNIT, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{POUT_OUT_DESC, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{POUT_OUT_NAME, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{POUT_STAFF_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_OUT_TYPE, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_OUT_SPACE_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{POUT_AMOUNT, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RESULT_MSG, mode=INOUT, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

CALL PRO_VENDITION_SUBMIT ( #{P_BATCH_NO, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{P_AMOUNT, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_SALE_ID,mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_UNIT,mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{P_PRODUCT_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_SALE_D_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_ENTER_D_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_UNIT_PRICE, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_SPACE_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{P_DESC, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{P_OUT_NAME, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{P_OPER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RESULT_MSG, mode=INOUT, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

SELECT t.out_d_id, t2.out_name, t.batch_no, t3.name_ch AS product_name, CONCAT(t.amount, t.unit) AS amount_str, t.out_date, t.out_desc, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t5.space_name, '-') FROM dict_warehouse_space t5 WHERE FIND_IN_SET( t5.space_id, query_parent_warehouse (t.space_id) ) ) AS space_name, t4.staff_name FROM product_material_out_detail t JOIN product_material_out t2 ON (t.out_id = t2.out_id) JOIN product_material_info t3 ON (t.product_id = t3.product_id) JOIN staff_info t4 ON (t.staff_id = t4.staff_id) WHERE t.enter_d_id = #{purchase_d_id}
SELECT enter_d_id FROM product_material_enter_detail WHERE batch_no=#{P_BATCH_NO} AND product_id=#{P_PRODUCT_ID}
